mapper.select: select s.SUPPLIER_ID, s.SUPPLIER_NAME, s.SUPPLIER_PERSON, s.SUPPLIER_TEL, s.SUPPLIER_EMAIL, s.SUPPLIER_ADDRESS from wms_supplier s
select s.SUPPLIER_ID, s.SUPPLIER_NAME, s.SUPPLIER_PERSON, s.SUPPLIER_TEL, s.SUPPLIER_EMAIL, s.SUPPLIER_ADDRESS from wms_supplier s where s.SUPPLIER_ID = #{id}
select s.SUPPLIER_ID, s.SUPPLIER_NAME, s.SUPPLIER_PERSON, s.SUPPLIER_TEL, s.SUPPLIER_EMAIL, s.SUPPLIER_ADDRESS from wms_supplier s where s.SUPPLIER_NAME = #{supplierName}
select s.SUPPLIER_ID, s.SUPPLIER_NAME, s.SUPPLIER_PERSON, s.SUPPLIER_TEL, s.SUPPLIER_EMAIL, s.SUPPLIER_ADDRESS from wms_supplier s where s.SUPPLIER_NAME like concat(concat('%',#{supplierName}),'%')
